pullRequest.title: Support of method getHashedData (hierarchical and with groups)
pullRequest.bodyText:
add support to Common.pm
add support of new methods to ServicesAgent.pm
create a new object HashedGenData.pm as result of reading data from
RPC (this objects will be used when working with HashedData in
services)

nodes.bodyText: I am just curious. Do we need these two set methods?
One more small thing. When you chose not to quote hash keys, it would be better to be consistent with all of them.
